claims.claim: Nubank serves around 54 million customers across Brazil, Mexico and Colombia
claims.quote: Nubank has achieved unicorn startup status and is today one of the world's largest digital banking platforms, serving around 54 million customers across Brazil, Mexico and Colombia.

claims.claim: Nubank registered 42,000 new users per day in Q1 2020
claims.quote: In the first quarter of 2020, the bank registered an average of 42 thousand new users per day
Between April and June of 2021, the volume of new customers in this range was 50 percent higher than in the same period in 2019.

claims.claim: Nubank has 115M+ users with 80% growth from word-of-mouth referrals
claims.quote: A digital bank with 115M+ users – built with empathy and scaled with trust... 80% of that growth comes from word-of-mouth referrals alone.

claims.claim: Nubank maintains a Net Promoter Score of 90
claims.quote: At the heart of this engine is one number – its Net Promoter Score (NPS). Clocking in at 90, nearly three times higher than incumbents and other major local fintechs

claims.claim: Customer acquisition cost held steady at $7 in 2023-2024
claims.quote: The customer acquisition cost has held steady at $7 for both 2023 and 2024, up slightly from $6.5 in 2022

claims.claim: 94% of customer calls answered in under 45 seconds
claims.quote: 94% of customer calls are answered in under 45 seconds.

claims.claim: Payments Assistant platform saved customers 750K+ hours in one year
claims.quote: Nubank's Payments Assistant platform for bills and recurring transactions saved customers 750K+ hours in one year.

claims.claim: Overdraft alerts helped customers avoid R$4M in interest in one month
claims.quote: Open finance-powered overdraft alerts helped avoid R$4M in interest in just a month.

claims.claim: Nubank grew from 93.9M to 114.3M customers (22% YoY growth)
claims.quote: Nubank grew from 93.9M customers in 2023 to 114.3M in 2024—adding over 20M users (22% YoY).

claims.claim: Cost to serve dropped to $0.8 per user from $0.9
claims.quote: cost to serve dropped to $0.8 per user, down from $0.9

claims.claim: Nubank has only 1,222 complaints per million users
claims.quote: Nubank received only 1,222 complaints per million users in Q4 2024. That's far lower than both incumbents (Itau: 4,127; Santander: 3,365) and new-age fintechs like PagBank (7,926) and Inter (7,496).

claims.claim: Active users hit 94.9M with 83% activity rate
claims.quote: Active users hit 94.9M in 2024, sustaining an 83% activity rate.
